name: UserdataAPI
func:
import requests
import json

url = "https://localhost/V1.0/users"

payload = json.dumps({
  "user_id": "xyz234",
  "surname": "muster",
  "firstname": "max",
  "street": "Dammweg 8",
  "postcode": "1234",
  "city": "ZÃ¼rich"
})
headers = {
  'Content-Type': 'application/json'
}

response = requests.request("POST", url, headers=headers, data=payload)

print(response.text)
return (response.text)
